timeline.message:
[miio] enable telnet for lumi gateway

* allow enable telnet and some other functions on gateway
* use new fw as default for chugmi plug

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

[miio] add missing enable_telnet_service

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.bodyText:
Same typo here and elsewhere too.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            | doorbelVol       | Number  | Doorbell Volume                     |
          
          
            
            | doorbellVol       | Number  | Doorbell Volume                     |
timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -1067,6 +1068,46 @@ e.g. `smarthome:send actionCommand 'upd_timer["1498595904821", "on"]'` would ena | SpeedLevel | Number | Fan-Speed Level | | PhysicalControlsLocked | Switch | Physical Control Locked-Physical Control Locked | +### Mi Smart Home Gateway v1 (lumi.gateway.v1) Channels + +| Channel | Type | Description | +|------------------|---------|-------------------------------------| +| telnetEnable | Switch | Enable Telnet | +| doorbelVol | Number | Doorbell Volume | +| gatewayVol | Number | Gateway Volume | +| alarmingVol | Number | Alarming Volume | +| doorbellPush | String | Doorbell Push | + +### Mi Smart Home Gateway v2 (lumi.gateway.v2) Channels + +| Channel | Type | Description | +|------------------|---------|-------------------------------------| +| telnetEnable | Switch | Enable Telnet | +| doorbelVol | Number | Doorbell Volume |
